    Android.mk

    LOCAL_PATH := $(call my-dir)

include $(CLEAR_VARS)

LOCAL_MODULE := hello-world
LOCAL_SRC_FILES := hello-world.cpp

include $(BUILD_EXECUTABLE)

    Application.mk

    APP_ABI := armeabi-v7a arm64-v8a
APP_PLATFORM := android-23
APP_STL := c++_shared

    hello-world.cpp

    #include <iostream>

using namespace std;

int main() {
    cout << "hello world" << sizeof(char*) << endl;
}
